vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σαλώμη, -ης, ἡ
(< Heb. שָׁלוֹם),
Salome: Mrk.15:40 16:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mrk.15.40; her mother was Mary (G3137H);
sister of: James (G2385J) and Joseph (G2501H)
§ Salome, "peaceful, prosperous one"
Salome, (Proper name), a Galilean woman who followed Jesus, Mt. 27:56; Mk. 15:40; 16:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒羅米 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "和平的"
西庇太的妻子，也是使徒雅各和約翰的母親 #可 15:40;16:1|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒罗米 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "和平的"
西庇太的妻子，也是使徒雅各和约翰的母亲 #可 15:40;16:1|
